mean_en: a written list of questions that are answered by a number of people so that information can be collected from the answers
sentence: Please fill out this questionnaire so that we can improve our service.
sentence_trans: 请填写这份调查问卷，这样可以帮助我们改善服务。
word_etyma: quest询问 + ion名词后缀 + n + aire人 → questionnaire调查表，问卷
